comment: I took this class thinking the bad reviews were just lazy students. Do not make the same mistake as me. The weekly work is easy. The tests are lockdown. He claims its on the first 2 sentences of every paragraph in tested chapters (30+ pages)(not helpful). He thinks its funny that he doesn't give guidance for a required class. Pretty disrespectful.

Took the class online and it was a horrible experience. His video lectures were way too long and usually had nothing to do with the test. Your grade is dictated by your performance on exams but he doesn't give you any resources to help you prepare for them. Its honestly comical that he refers to himself as a proffesor.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: This professor expects you to remember the whole book for test and gives no insight to what is coming for the test. Completely ridiculous for those that are taking the class as a requirement when history is not their major. Run far away if you can.

Professor Kersey is really funny professor, the only downside was that his lectures were boring (so are most history lectures). This was a pretty easy class to take online. He gives a crossword puzzle and a 5 question quiz every week and 3 discussion boards throughout the semester. It's an easy A if you read the book!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: He put the textbook online so we didn't have to buy it, but that was pretty much the only positive. The lectures were extremely boring and your grade was pretty much decided by a few tests. I love history and this class was tedious and difficult for me. Also he doesn't respect his students very much and gets little respect in return.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY

comment: He's nice but there is so much reading. He doesn't really review the reading and the PowerPoint's have nothing to do with the reading.

Attendance is graded, so bring your computer and watch Netflix with subtitles. It's a better use of your time. I think some parts of the world use videos of his lectures as punishment.   Avoid this class at all costs. He's a miserable person who hates being there, and it shows. Rude, but thinks he's a comedian. Tests are challenging too, by the way

While walking to this class I often did not look twice before crossing the street in hopes to get hit by a car to avoid going to his class. Terrible professor, extremely boring and bland. His lectures are useless and his tests are way harder than they should be. He should really consider retiring. AVOID AT ALL COSTS
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: HORRIBLE PROFESSOR. His lectures are pointless but you're required to come. Sometimes he reads directly out of the textbook for the entire class. I feel like I haven't learned anything. He makes his class much more difficult than it should be. He isn't clear what's on the tests and they're over 4-5 chapters at a time, so they're very hard. AVOID.
